item.title: VCD, POV, FTV Departments’ Winter Break Workshops
item.content:
VCD, POV and FTV Departments are organizing workshops during the winter break. The aim of the workshops is to provide additional support to the students who need to master the use of professional applications and software in order to improve their design skills and to increase their level of technical knowledge in different fields.
The workshops are delivered by the academic staff of VCD, POV and FTV departments, experienced students and guests lecturers specialized on their subjects.
In this scope, during the 2008-2009 academic year’s winter break, 15 different workshops will be organized. All the workshops are free and anyone interested may join.
You can access more detailed information at:

http://vcd.bilgi.edu.tr/workshop
